author: Special Correspondent
text: Rotary Coimbatore Central conducted a programme ‘Wish Tree’ aimed at serving underprivileged children recently. The wishes of about 350 children from poor background were fulfilled by the club as a part of Pongal celebrations. In addition, children were given the opportunity of filling gift cards, which were later put on display in the event. Visitors were also given the chance to contribute and fulfil the other wishes expressed by the children on the ‘Wish Tree’.
title: Programme held
